Solar-powered microgrids: Develop a network of small-scale solar panels to provide power to remote areas or communities that are not connected to the main electricity grid.
Wind turbines for residential use: Design and install wind turbines in residential areas to generate clean energy for homes and businesses.
Geothermal power plants: Build geothermal power plants to harness the heat from the earth's core to generate electricity.
Biomass-to-energy conversion: Use organic waste to produce electricity through a process called gasification.
Wave energy conversion: Build wave energy converters to harness the power of ocean waves to generate electricity.
